WorkItem.Description:
Hi,
 
Why am i unable to put two RTE controls on a single page?? Is it designed to be used as a singleton?? or is this a bug ??

WorkItem.Summary: Unable to put two RTE Controls on a single page

Comments.Message: This is a known issue. Unfortunately the fix is hard to implement. Originally the control was authored to be one per page but we're hoping to eventually support more than one per page.
